EagerTest.Definition: A test method that tests more than one method in one test method.
EagerTest.Steps: 1. Break down the test method:Break down your test method into smaller methods, each testing a single method of the system under test. Name each new test method in a way that clearly indicates the functionality or behavior it is testing. 2. Refactor: Move the appropriate setup, execution, and verification code to each new test method.
